Guard abilities can sometimes be used offensively as long as the type of incoming attack matches the type of guard

def guards can counter atk based abilities
spdef guards can counter spatk based abilities

Use the proper ability to survive the incoming attack and defeat your opponent in the same turn.
jeminiw used **Counter Guard** to defend themselves!
Practice Fighter used **Physical Attack** on jeminiw
jeminiw blocked the attack and followed up with a counter attack!
